channel.title: pretraining on Jonathan`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in pretraining on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 跨模态预训练] Democratizing Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training (2022)
item.description: 2203.05796 Democratizing Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training: A CLIP Benchmark of Data, Model, and Supervision (2022) 开源代码传送门 概述 现有关于 CLIP 的工作由于其训练策略及所用数据的差异，难以公平对比其表现。 本文旨在构建一个公平且可以
